response.original_title: 田中と呪物と怪談と　第４回　後編
response.overview: Toshiyuki Tanaka explains the haunted objects he has brought with him. The first cursed object in the second half of the fourth session is a "cursed wooden mask. The mask, which was entrusted to him by the famous ghost story-telling monk Miki Daigumo Shonin, is said to have been used by a famous celebrity couple who suffered terrible misfortune after wearing the mask on a TV program.
response.title: Tanaka to Jumonmono to Kaidan to Dai 4-kai Kōhen
